newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Philippines declares May 12 nationwide holiday.
newsitem.headline: Philippines declares May 12 nationwide holiday.

text.p: Philippine President Fidel Ramos has declared May 12 a holiday to allow local elections to be held, the presidential palace said on Friday.
Presidential press undersecretary Marcelo Lagmay said there would be no work in the government and private sector throughout the country on election day.
Ramos issued a proclamation declaring Monday "a special day... to give the people the fullest opportunity to participate in the said elections."
